name: Mircron Wars XR (itch)
description:
Mircron Wars XR is an easy to play arcade space shooter, with an endless area to play in and countless Enemies to destroy.

FEATURES:

There are 18 ships to unlock and play as.

Many different enemies to blast away at.

Boss ships.

HD graphics.

Lots of Weapons to blast away at ships with.

DESCRIPTION:

Blast away enemy ships for hours in this fast and easy to play arcade-shooter.

Collect pickups to help you survive longer in this free roaming mayhem top-down sci-fi experience.

This is an endless destructive shooter that will push you to your limits.

Due to its simplicity, it is easy for anyone to play and gain ground quickly.

Collect coins to unlock ships.

Music and sfx has now been completed.  The game is finished, if any unknown bugs please report in the comments.

I hope you enjoy playing as much as I enjoyed making it.

Minimum System Requirements:

500 MB of Disk Space.

- Dual Core 2 ghz.

- 500 MB Ram.

- radeon/nvidia 500 MB graphics card.

Recommended System Requirements:

- 500 MB Disk Space.

- Quad core 3 ghz.

- 2 GIG of Ram.

- radeon/nvidia 2 GIG graphics card.
